about.name: Zoey Cheng
about.title: Web Developer
about.line1: Over 2 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in SPA development using frameworks such as Vue and Blazor.
about.line2: Proficient in the .NET Core architecture with hands-on experience in ASP.NET MVC for page rendering and routing control.
about.line3: Capable of working independently or collaboratively across departments, consistently delivering projects on time.
about.line4: Passionate about learning new technologies — currently diving into React and Node.js — and aspiring to become a versatile developer who masters tools and adapts flexibly.

master.major: Master of Science in Information Systems, Financial Services and Fintech Micro-credentials
